label: japanFinancialInstitutionCommonId
comment: The Japan Financial Institution Common identifier as assigned by the Japanese Bankers Association for this creditor financial institution.
The Japan Financial Institution Common identifier as assigned by the Japanese Bankers Association for this debtor financial institution.

domainIncludes.comment: A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that receives money.
A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that owes money.
